      mask: 11111111.11110000.00000000.00000000 -> 255.240.0.0
ip gateway: 10000000.00000000.00000000.00000001 -> 128.0.0.1
  ip broad: 10000000.00001111.11111111.11111111 -> 128.15.255.255
Rete 12 bit
Host 20 bit
